name: send_a_word_to_check
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shimoneta.
Tool description: This api can check if the input word is risky or not on global. It supports Japanese and English.
API description: Sends a word to an API to check if it is vulgar and returns information about the word.

content_type.description: The type of content to be specified in the query.

word.description: The word to be checked for vulgarity.
